start: ^Oh, good morning, my name is Janice, and, and I've got a little bit of a problem with my emails. Can you help me by any chance?

s: ^Of course I can help you ma'am

c-0: ^Oh thank you my dear, I do really appreciate it.
c-1: ^Oh, I'm sorry to bother you, it's just it's quite a big problem.
g-0: ^I've been trying to fix this for hours you see, I just can't seem to figure it out.
^I keep getting these emails, with different things for me to buy, and I don't want to buy them. The emails just keep filling up and there's too many of them.

s: ^I need you to log in to your email account and grant me access.
